column5: Hey guys and gals,  I was hoping you could help settle an argument between a couple guys, one guy want to go to Mccrea lake for the long weekend and one wants to go to Tomagami.  if you could post your insight on both places it would be great  Thanks everyone
I havn't herd anything good about Mcrae lake.  Poor fishing and dirty campsites.  It'l be a zoo on the long weekend.  Been posted about on here a few times.
Thanks for the response NAW, I know it has been posted before but just want some fresh insight on where to go
Having never been to McCrae lake, I can tell you it has nothing to offer   Seriously though, based on what I've heard, and compared to what I've experienced in Temagami....it's a no brainer.
I would stay away from McRae lake unless you like being surrounded by idiots. Especially on a long weekend.
If you're going to hoot and hauler and make noise.. please go to McCrae !  Otherwise... it's a no brainer as Johnny said!
hahaha im trying to stay away from that stuff,  Thanks for the responses everyone, looks like we are not going to go to McCrae, but going North!
